title: @riot Why cant annie's ult be like fizz's?
body:
Lets face it, annie's ult lacks counterplay and needs no skill to use. Adding a skill shot and small delay to it would help in both of these areas. 
Something like, Annie throws her teddy, sticking to the first champ hit. After a small delay tibbers appears doing aoe dmg and stunning those in the area(if she had her stun charged to do so).
This would add some form of skill to a champ that needs little to no mechanical skill to use. 
Thoughts?

replies.body:
1: it is a skillshot, just w/o delay
2: you would actually make Annie a useless champion if you were to just flat out gut her like that w/o compensation
3: +0 points for originality
So adding some form of skill and counterplay to her would be gutting her? That makes no sense.

I can't believe I have to explain this to you.

Okay child, so listen closely. When you add delay to things, they scale very quickly from good to very bad. Take for example, the change to Gragas's Q back when he was dominant as an AP mage. They only changed one thing, one very simple thing. They added a delay to his damage on the Q, forcing you to wait for it to do all of its damage. That one single change put him into the dumps until he was picked up again in S5 because he worked as a tank. Annie isn't even as popular as Gragas was, and is definitely seeing less comp. play.
So, when you add a delay to Annie's R, you gut her. Her ult is already predictable enough, with an easy to keep track of cooldown, and the range of which makes for clear indication when she is using it. Not to mention the counterplay of buying {{item:3140}} and all other MR items, which you are blatantly ignoring with this post.
So again, putting a delay like Fizz's ult would gut Annie.

Lol qss which is primarily build on adc's does not save them from annies burst. A simple R,Q,W and they are dead regardless of the qss active or not. 
Grags barrel isnt comparable here. It is a non ultimate ability that was doing the same dmg as some ults. It needed the nerf.

Is the Gragas comparison really irrelevant though? Both what you are suggesting and what happened to Gragas are delays of the effects of a spell. Regardless of whether it is an ultimate or a Q, you are still changing it. And as you claim that the Gragas change needed to happen, you claim the Annie change needs to happen. Don't talk if you can't avoid such logical fallacies.

Yeah so Annie deserves an instant Aoe burst/sustain dmg/ stun ult? If you cant react to something in the game then it shouldnt be in the game. Gragas barrels you can see coming, while also having enough time to react and dodge. Annies ult cannot be dodged by reaction time. Name another skill shot in the game that cant be dodged by reacting?

First of all you last statement was not a question, it was a command, so the question mark is unnecessary. Second, here is a list:
Soraka silence
Anivia ult
Gangplank ult
Cho'Gath silence
Malphite ult gives you about two frames to react
Etc.
Some of these are bad examples but I'm sorry that's the quickest list I've got. Of course there are others but I don't want to take three years making a complete list.

Also a note on your first sentence: it's not news that Annie has an AoE stun damage burst. That's actually what makes her a unique pick compared to other mages.
Well malph's can be reacted to, its clearly not instant. And all the oother besides cho's you can clearly walk out of. Those also dont have stuns attached to them.
If you don't think that timing plays a role, how about Veigar's W? Its delay was decreased by .25 seconds and his winrate spiked from 47% to 56% in a single patch.
It can be dodged by reaction. Riot changed it because it was "anti fun". Annies ult has the same issue as veigs stun did. Yet its allowed to stay in the broken state its in?
What about Viktor's ult? Instant, larger radius.
Does it stun you? Shit they even removed the silence. Yet annies is allowed to have a stun.

Doesn't matter if Viktor's ult has a stun if it one shots you- something that Annie's ult can't do. I've killed squishies with a single QE, and sometimes my ult alone. 
There are SO many more reasons why Annie is nothing but horse crap.
it's gutting because that would be a 100% nerf, she'll need something to compensate
It's the circle of life. Annie counters mobility, mobility counters range, and range counters Annie.

Oh bs dude. Tell me what counters a flash tibbers? There isnt a ranged champ in the game that can survive annies burst. Qss gets rid of the stun, yet you still die to the dmg. Lets not even get into how trash banshees is.

>Tell me what counters a flash tibbers?

I wasn't going to say anything, but...

1. Everyone has access to flash

2. While it should be a consideration for balance, flash isn't part of a champion's kit.

You know what an Annie without flash can do against someone with range? Counterplay is more than just the immediate outcome.
Nah. Annies tibber range can reach most adc's without needing flash. Not to mention she has her Q and W which can apply the stun. After that all she has to do is R and you're dead.

Mages (magic burst) naturally counter ADC's in the first place...

By range, we don't mean AA, we mean spells. Plenty of ADC's have spells to extend their effective range, but an ADC shouldn't be in range of a mage without a plan. That's the assassin's/long-range mage/tank's job.

> [{quoted}](name=YouFoundThe6God,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=71vbamAG,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-03-08T03:47:46.351+0000)
>
> Oh bs dude. Tell me what counters a flash tibbers? There isnt a ranged champ in the game that can survive annies burst. Qss gets rid of the stun, yet you still die to the dmg. Lets not even get into how trash banshees is.

That's a 5min cooldown play man.... the counter is that now you have 5 min where she can't flash tibbers anymore, not to mention that she just burned her only escape so she can be focused down easily or zone out since her range is so small.
She's not even OP. The instant AoE ult is the only thing that makes her viable, and she still doesnt even see pro play. She's just a low elo stomp.
Someone got beat by an annie and wants to qq.
As long as Tibbers still apears despite a missâ€” not terrible. The question would be why? Why not just make her Q a skill-shot like Veiger?
Thats also an excellent idea. And yes it would still appears and do dmg just like fizz's. While still being able to be on the battlefield after the initial burst.

Thats the entire point. She doesn't deserve and instant ult. The ult would still be powerful without it being instant. A skillshot and  .75 delay wouldn't break her it would add counter play that is much needed.

It could even be something like mao's sappling toss. Only chasing after champions, and going off after contact. 
If no champion is in range, half mana and cd is refunded. 
The spell just needs tweaking.
